sourcesContent:
<template>
  <navbar 
        :pages="pages" 
        :active-page="0"
        :nav-link-click="(index) => activePage = index"
    ></navbar>
    <page-content :page="pages[activePage]"></page-content>
</template>

<script>

import PageContent from '../src/components/PageContent.vue'
import Navbar from './components/Navbar.vue'

export default {
  components: {
    Navbar,
    PageContent
  },
  data() {
    return {
      activePage: 0,
      pages: [
        {
          link: { text: "about me", url: "../sites/about-me.html" },
          pageTitle: "Home",
          pageContent: "Hello Home",
        },
        {
          link: { text: "projects", url: "../sites/projects.html" },
          pageTitle: "Projects",
          pageContent: "Hello Projects",
        },
        {
          link: {
            text: "interaction design",
            url: "../sites/interaction-design.html",
          },
          pageTitle: "Interaction Design",
          pageContent: "Hello Interaction Design",
        },
        {
          link: { text: "tutorials", url: "../tutorials/tutorials.html" },
          pageTitle: "Tutorials",
          pageContent: "Hello Tutorials",
          subpages: [
            {
              link: {
                text: "images",
                url: "../tutorials/links-and-images/images.html",
              },
              pageTitle: "Images",
              pageContent: "Hello Images",
            },
            {
              link: {
                text: "extras",
                url: "../tutorials/links-and-images/extras.html",
              },
              pageTitle: "Extras",
              pageContent: "Hello Extras",
            },
          ],
        },
      ],
    };
  },
}
</script>
